dmca.title: Template Monster www.templatemonster.com
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Nancy Wolff [mailto:nwolff@cdas.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 05, 2007 4:51 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: FW: Template Monster www.templatemonster.com
Importance: High

 

 

 

Nancy E. Wolff
Cowan DeBaets Abrahams & Sheppard LLP
41 Madison Avenue, 34th floor
New York, NY 10010
Tel:  (212) 974-7474
Fax: (212) 974-8474
Email: nwolff@cdas.com

 

Privileged/Confidential Information may be contained in this message. If
you are not the addressee indicated in this message (or responsible for
delivery the message to such person), you may not copy or deliver this
message to anyone. In such case, you should destroy this message and
kindly notify the sender by reply email. Please advise immediately if
you or your employer does not consent to Internet email for message of
this kind. Opinions, conclusions and other information in this message
that do not relate to the official business of my firm shall be
understood as neither given nor endorsed by it.

________________________________

From: Nancy Wolff [mailto:nwolff@cdas.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 05, 2007 5:06 PM
To: 'abuse@theplanet.com'
Cc: 'Miffy Evans'
Subject: Template Monster www.templatemonster.com
Importance: High

 

 

Re:  DMCA copyright infringement

 

To Whom It May Concern:

 

I represent Image Source Ltd., the owner or exclusive licensor of the
identified photographs and who has authorized me to act on its behalf
for copyright infringement notification. 

 

Infringements of 180 images Image Source photographs (the "Photographs")
have been detected on the Web site http://www.templatemonster.com which
we believe is hosted by EV1.  The details of the infringing uses are
listed on the annexed spread sheet which identifies the image and the
location on the website for easy removal. 

 

This letter is an official notification under the provisions of Section
512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act to effect removal of the
detected infringements.  I hereby request that you IMMEDIATELY issue a
cancel message, as specified in RFC 1036, for the specified posting and
prevent the infringer, who is identified by its Web address,
www.template.monster from further posting the Photographs to your
servers in the future. Please be advised that by law, as a service
provider, you must "expeditiously remove or disable access to" the
infringing photograph(s) upon receiving this notice. Noncompliance may
result in a loss of the possibility of immunity under the DMCA. 

 

 

I have a good faith belief that use of the images by Template Monster is
not authorized by Image Source, its licensing representatives, or the
law.  The information provided herein is accurate to the best of my
knowledge.  I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that I am authorized
to act on behalf of Image Source for matters pertaining to notification
of infringement of its exclusive rights in its copyrighted material.

 

Please confirm by email or telephone that you have complied with your
obligations under the DMCA by removing the Photographs. 

 

Very truly yours,

 

Nancy E. Wolff

Nancy E. Wolff

nwolff@cdas.com

 

 

 

 

In compliance with DMCA notice requirements, Image Source is the
exclusive licensee or copyright owner with respect to each image
identified on the annexed spread sheet. The spread sheet identifies the
image and the location on the website for easy removal.  I am authorized
on Image Sources' behalf to provide official notification under the
provisions of Section 512(c) of the DMCA to effect removal of the
detected infringements of these images.  I therefore request that you
advise Template Monster to immediately issue a cancel message, as
specified in RFC 1036, for the specified postings and to cease from
posting the infringing images in the future. 

 

Please advise me whether your client will effect the removal by the end
of the day Monday, April 2. Otherwise we will inform the ISP who will be
required to immediately effect removal

 

I have a good faith belief that use of the images by Template Monster is
not authorized by Image Source, its licensing representatives, or the
law.  The information provided herein is accurate to the best of my
knowledge.  I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that I am authorized
to act on behalf of Image Source for matters pertaining to notification
of infringement of its exclusive rights in its copyrighted material.

 

 

Nancy E. Wolff
Cowan DeBaets Abrahams & Sheppard LLP
41 Madison Avenue, 34th floor
New York, NY 10010
Tel:  (212) 974-7474
Fax: (212) 974-8474
Email: nwolff@cdas.com

 

Privileged/Confidential Information may be contained in this message. If
you are not the addressee indicated in this message (or responsible for
delivery the message to such person), you may not copy or deliver this
message to anyone. In such case, you should destroy this message and
kindly notify the sender by reply email. Please advise immediately if
you or your employer does not consent to Internet email for message of
this kind. Opinions, conclusions and other information in this message
that do not relate to the official business of my firm shall be
understood as neither given nor endorsed by it.
